content.question:
Figure 1. Model of a cellular process

Which of the following best describes the model shown in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: The model shows how genetic information directs the synthesis of polypeptides.
The model shows how a mutation in the <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>DNA</mtext></math> results in a nonfunctional protein.

The model shows how information in the <math alttext="m R N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>mRNA</mtext></math> can be used to make both protein and <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>DNA</mtext></math>.

The model shows how proteins are needed for the synthesis of both <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>DNA</mtext></math> and <math alttext="R N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>RNA</mtext></math>.

content.answer: The model shows how genetic information directs the synthesis of polypeptides.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
